debug.h

Defines debugs flags and print_debug macro which use them.

Summary
debug.hDefines debugs flags and print_debug macro which use them.
Macros
print_debugPrints debugging message if PASTIX_DEBUG is defined and if the debug flag is the to 1.

Macros

print_debug

Prints debugging message if PASTIX_DEBUG is defined and if the debug flag is the to 1.
